full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DMIGS BRTZE MA LA BSTEN PA'I BKRU BYABS BSRUNGS GSUM BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES BUM CHOG 'DI NI SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR RGYAL PO DANG BTZAN LOGS PA SDE BRGYAD DRONG 'BYUNG RNAMS KYIS 'TSE BA'I 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN PA'I CHED DU 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MCHOD PDON PA SHES DAR PI LIG THU SHES RAB BZANG PO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, DPAL MGON BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS LCAGS KHYI LO PA'I DBYAR ZLA THA MA'I TSES BCU DRUG LA TSE CHOG THU NVA GVAR ZHES PA'I SA TSAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BU MDZAD NGAG DBANG LEGS BSHAD KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,DZA YANTU, SARBA MANGGA LAm,)
author_simple: DPAL MGON BZHAD RDOR MING CAN,
